definitions.description: A Policy transaction provides information of each transaction (e.g., amendment) of the Policy.

constantValues: A Policy transaction provides information of each transaction (e.g., amendment) of the Policy.

members.name: createdOn
members.description: Date and time when the record was created.

constantValues: Date and time when the record was created.

members.name: modifiedOn
members.description: Date and time when the record was modified.

constantValues: Date and time when the record was modified.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

supportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'statecode_display' is added to the 'PolicyTransaction' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'statecode'
supportingAttribute.name: statecode_display

members.name: statuscode
members.description: Reason for the status of the Policy Term

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupCorrelatedValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder, correlatedValue}

supportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'statuscode_display' is added to the 'PolicyTransaction' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'statuscode'
supportingAttribute.name: statuscode_display

constantValues: Reason for the status of the Policy Term

members.name: importSequenceNumber
members.description: Sequence number of the import that created this record.

constantValues: Sequence number of the import that created this record.

members.name: overriddenCreatedOn
members.description: Date and time that the record was migrated.

constantValues: Date and time that the record was migrated.

members.name: UTCConversionTimeZoneCode
members.description: Time zone code that was in use when the record was created.

constantValues: Time zone code that was in use when the record was created.

members.name: amendmentnumber
members.description: Reference number of revisions made to the Policy, e.g., add a vehicle.

constantValues: Reference number of revisions made to the Policy, e.g., add a vehicle.

members.name: effectivedate
members.description: Begin date of the Policy and when it is in effect.

constantValues: Begin date of the Policy and when it is in effect.

members.name: expirationdate
members.description: End date of the Policy term and when it is expired.

constantValues: End date of the Policy term and when it is expired.

members.name: requestchannel
members.description: The channel type the request came from.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

supportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'requestchannel_display' is added to the 'PolicyTransaction' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'requestchannel'
supportingAttribute.name: requestchannel_display

constantValues: The channel type the request came from.

members.name: revisionnumber
members.description: Version of the amendment to existing Policy.

constantValues: Version of the amendment to existing Policy.

members.name: type
members.description: The type of term, for example renewal, new, term, permanent.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

supportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'type_display' is added to the 'PolicyTransaction' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'type'
supportingAttribute.name: type_display

constantValues: The type of term, for example renewal, new, term, permanent.
